name: @pojntfx-incubator/dsb-gateway-backend
description: A simple gateway microservice to the proprietary "Digitales Schwarzes Brett" service used in German schools. Uses @pojntfx-incubator/dsb-gateway-core to get the data.

scripts.dev: mkdir -p data/ && touch data/db.json && mkdir -p static/img && npm run build:watch & micro-dev --port 3000 dist/json-server.js --watch dist/ & micro-dev --port 4000 dist/static-server.js --watch dist/
scripts.start: mkdir -p data/ && touch data/db.json && mkdir -p static/img & micro --listen tcp://0.0.0.0:3000 dist/json-server.js & micro --listen tcp://0.0.0.0:4000 dist/static-server.js

author: Felix Pojtinger <felix@pojtinger.com>
